resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106159</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106159</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770213255</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Highwayman</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Highwayman</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Highwayman</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Highwayman</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Highwayman</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Highwayman</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Highwayman</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is an audio presentation of Alfred Noyes' famous poem, a "dark screen" video with titles and credits added at beginning and end.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine Audiodarstellung Alfred Noyes' des
berühmten Gedichtes, des Bildschirmes "des dunklen Bildschirms" mit 
Namen und der Gutschriften, die am Beginn und am Ende hinzugefügt 
werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une présentation sonore de poésie 
célèbre d'Alfred Noyes, d'un vidéo "d'écran foncé" avec des 
titres et des crédits ajoutés à commencer et à extrémité.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma apresentação audio do poema famoso 
de Alfred Noyes', "de um vídeo da tela escura" com títulos e dos 
créditos adicionados no começo e na extremidade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è una presentazione audio del poem famoso 
del Alfred Noyes, "di un video dello schermo scuro" con i titoli e 
degli accreditamenti aggiunti all'inizio ed all'estremità.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια ηχητική παρουσίαση του διάσημου 
ποιήματος του Alfred Noyes', ένα βίντεο "σκοτεινής οθόνησ" 
με τους τίτλους και τις πιστώσεις που προστίθενται στην αρχή και 
το τέλος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ésta es una presentación audio del poema famoso 
de Alfred Noyes, de un vídeo de la "pantalla oscura" con títulos y 
de los créditos agregados en comenzar y el extremo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:POEM BY ALFRED NOYES, NARRATED AND PRODUCED BY URGELT.
FN:POEM BY ALFRED NOYES, NARRATED AND PRODUCED BY URGELT.
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770213255</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106159</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-highwayman</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
